name: Lucent Depths
description:
---------- About the game ----------

You are a scavenger. Equipped with powerful blasters wich draw energy from the liquid neon in your blood you're on a hunt for loot and explore the lucent depths beneath.

How far can you venture into the deep in this fast paced action platformer?

When you die you loose all the loot you've collected in the current run. Every 3 dungeon layers there is a save area where you have the option to extract back to base and save your loot. The deeper you go the harder it gets but the more loot awaits you.

Beware of firing to much as your ammo is also your hp!

---------- Controls ----------

MoveA / DJumpSpaceSwitch weaponQ / EShoot / InteractLeft mouse buttonShift cameraShift
